comment: Dr.McDaniel is a bubbly person! She is caring, kind, & so supportive. All of the work is easy and presentations are fun! She cheers you on & will do whatever she can to make you feel supported. As long as you email her that you'll be absent, you won't get points off! She stalls the first few mins of class Incase anyone is late. She's the bestest!!

Dr. McDaniel is amazing!!!! Take her in any class. She is so organized and prepares you as a future educator. Her work is enjoyable and something you can hold onto and use in the future. Attendance is mandatory in this course, but she is very flexible!! No words can describe how great she is as a professor.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Loved every bit of her teaching method! Lots of room to apply your knowledge and improve your teaching abilities. Dr. McDaniel will always meet you where you are and is a professional at keeping open communication with every student. Attendance is mandatory but that's just how the coursework is set up. The workload is manageable.
she is just amazing and so supportive. 100% take her. enough said

Dr. McDaniel is such an amazing and caring professor! As long as you do the work and put in effort, you'll do just fine! She is such an inspirational person and she will be a professor that I will never forget. I was sad to leave her class!
Absolutely loved having Dr. McDaniel as a professor ! She cares so much about her students and wants you to do well! As long as you complete work on time and follow rubrics this class is an easy A!

AMAZING & HIGHLY RECOMMEND! Definitely would take class over again if I could. Very energetic, and supportive to students. Her organizational level is immaculate, clear, and concise. Her classroom is a safe space for open discussions. Her Teacher preparation of students is great. Knowledgeable about the politics in education, with great resources.

Easily my favorite professor I have ever had, she was so amazing. Words can't describe how much I enjoyed this class with Dr. McDaniel. She cares about each of her students individually. Her assignments can seem long and daunting at times, but she is always available for help and reassurance. She is understanding of any emergencies as well.

One of my favorite professors. She cares so much and genuinely wants her students to succeed. Her assignments are really interesting and sets you up for success. She cares so much about students, and I am planning on trying to get her for a future class.
